snippet: Bargemusic went contemporary on Friday night as Flux Quartet offered John Cage, Morton Feldman and others.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by new music ensemble Flux Quartet at Bargemusic.
lead_paragraph: Bargemusic went contemporary on Friday night as Flux Quartet offered John Cage, Morton Feldman and others.

headline.seo: Flux Quartet Brings John Cage to Bargemusic
headline.main: Music to Rock the Boat Fails to Disturb a Barge
headline.print_headline: Music to Rock the Boat Fails to Disturb a Barge
